tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE education_impact_on_poverty (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    participants_count INT,
    poverty_reduction_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE education_programs (
 program_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 program_name STRING,
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 impact_indicator STRING,
 participants INT,
 poverty_reduction_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE impact_evaluation (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(255),
    impact_area VARCHAR(255),
    evaluation_date DATE,
    impact_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE program_participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_id INT,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255),
    participant_age INT,
    participant_gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE program_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    evaluation_id INT,
    participant_id INT,
    result_description TEXT,
    result_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE education_programs (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    impact_metric FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    program_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES education_programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE evaluations (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    evaluation_score FLOAT,
    feedback TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE poverty_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    evaluation_id INT,
    poverty_level VARCHAR(20),
    poverty_rate FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (evaluation_id) REFERENCES evaluations(evaluation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE program_participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_id INT,
  participant_name VARCHAR(50),
  participant_age INT,
  participant_gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE program_evaluation (
  evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_id INT,
  evaluation_date DATE,
  evaluator_name VARCHAR(50),
  impact_rating INT
);
